channel.title: _Index on Clippy - we miss you
channel.description: Recent content in _Index on Clippy - we miss you

item.title: HackAThon: howto hack a small, C compiled software
item.description:
During the last Hackathon, we were asked to do some challenges, just for fun. One of them forced us to hack a small binary to get an address and use tcpdump to get a password.

How the hell am I supposed to do?

item.title: About me
item.description: My name is tot: I rock a great mustache What else do you need? my history To be honest, I’m having some trouble remembering right now, so why don’t you just watch my movie and it will answer all your questions.
